params._ctsiAddress: address of token instance being used
params._distDenominator: dividing factor to define prize amount
params._distNumerator: multiplier factor to define prize amount
params._maxPrize: max prize that this contract pays
params._minimumPrize: minimum prize that this contract pays

payWinner(address,uint256).details: only the pos contract can call this

getCurrentPrize().notice: Get prize of next Lottery round

payWinner(address,uint256).notice: Transfers token to winner of Lottery
